testcase.name: ESS Login functionality and JIO Centeral Page Validation
testcase.system-out: Given user is able to login into ESS using valid username as "ankur.jain" and password as "Word03Pass".passed Then user validates Tittle and image on Jio Central Page....................passed Then user validates Links and elements inside frames of Jio Central Page....passed Then Validates frames and Moving window from Jio Central page to Employee Central.passed Then Validates Tittle and image on Employee Central Page....................passed

testcase.name: ESS Forgot Pasword functionality verification
testcase.system-out: Given user is on ESS Forgot Password Page...................................passed Then user validates Logo and Tittle Forgot Password home page...............passed Then user validates second and third tittle of Forgot Password home page....passed Then Validates Error Message on entering incorrect userid/pwd on Password page.passed Then Validates Error Message on not entering any userid/pwd on forgot Password page.passed Then Validates Message on not entering correct userid/pwd on Forgot Password page.passed

testcase.name: ESS Generate Pasword functionality verification
testcase.system-out: Given user is on ESS Generate Password Page.................................passed Then user validates link & tittle for Generate Password page................passed Then user validates Static Text and image on Generate Password Page.........passed Then Validates username field & continue button on Generate Password Page..passed Then Validates invalid username and its corresponding error message on Generate Password Page.passed Then Validates error message when no username is entered on Generate Password Page.passed

testcase.name: : ESS Login Home Page Validation
testcase.system-out: Given user is on ESS Home Page..............................................passed Then user validates logo and tittle Page....................................passed Then user validates second and third tittle.................................passed Then Validates Error Message on entering incorrect "ankur.jain" and "Word09Pass" on Home page.passed Then Validates Tool Tip validation for Forgot/Generate Password on Home Page.passed
